Item.Name: Intermission Food Court
Item.Content:
Intermission Food Court in Disney's All-Star Music Resort, Disney's All-Star Music Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Intermission Food Court

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001762.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Choose from all of our greatest hits: grab ’n’ go items, burgers, pizza, pasta, hot or cold sandwiches, quesadillas, nachos and delectable desserts. Hot breakfast items are served until 11:00 AM.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: In-Room Dining - Disney's All-Star Music Resort
Item.Content:
Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's All-Star Music Resort in Disney's All-Star Music Resort, Disney's All-Star Music Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's All-Star Music Resort

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/25905.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Celebrate the taste of an all-star classic with a hearty, oven-fresh pizza—from the Mighty Meaty to Simply Supreme. Chicken Caesar salads and starters like breadsticks and boneless chicken wings are also available, as well as beer and wine.
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Name: Singing Spirits Pool Bar
Item.Content:
Singing Spirits Pool Bar in Disney's All-Star Music Resort, Disney's All-Star Music Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Singing Spirits Pool Bar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002136.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
You'll be in high spirits after a refreshing round at the bar. Then head over to the guitar-shaped Calypso Pool and hit a high note as you sip away from a chorus of specialty cocktails, draft beers, sangria and wine.
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!
